Class TimeAttackModeStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.mode.TimeAttackModeStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameModeStrategy
public class TimeAttackModeStrategy extends Object implements GameModeStrategy
Strategy for Time Attack mode. Player must reach a target score within a time limit.
